MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Recap of Episode 2.
Somehow, Alexandra and Penang Hill decided to play a game.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Huh, wha...?
Despite her confidence, the result was a disastrous defeat for Alexandra.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ugh!? This can't be right.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Penang Hill
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: You're all talk. You're a small fry, A.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
S-shut up! Let's start all over again!
I'll do it until I win, Pe! This can't be right! It's cheating!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Penang Hill
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Ugh, you're so weak and unsightly.
Ahhh~ so annoying!
Incidentally, the event was a three-part competition to see who could perform better at the three typical services at the Night Butterfly: dancing, underground ring fighting, and customer service.
The first one to take two strikes wins. At this point, Penang Hill has overwhelmingly won the dance and underground ring fight parts, which means that it is now settled.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ugh! No, it's not over yet! Last game, triple points for customer service! And if I win, then I win it all, right, Conductor? The Night Butterfly is a nightclub, so the most important thing is customer service, right?

Alexandra appeals to me with tears in her eyes, but honestly,
I feel like continuing to play the game any longer will only add to her shame.

Let's take a look back at the games so far.
First, the dancing category.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Penang Hill
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ―Well, I'll just dance like a butterfly.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Eh, huh? What's this, wha-, hyaah!?
It is quite difficult to dance in a train that is constantly shaking. Penang Hill, who has a strong core and an excellent sense of balance, still dances gracefully, but...
The harder Alexandra tries to dance, the more her posture slumps, and finally she falls into a car window and almost goes flying. It's not a game, but a near disaster.

And then the second game, underground ring fight. There's an underground ring in the Night Butterfly, and Penang Hill is the undisputed champion in the arena where the fiercest fighters in the underworld hold their fights.

Originally, it was supposed to be a pure fighting match without weapons,
but Alexandra insisted and made it a rule that weapons could be used.

Alexandra's main weapon, commonly known as the "juice server," is... Normally, it's only used for her hobby of making mixed juice. In fact, it is a powerful ancient weapon that has been excavated from the ruins of the desert, and can crush all manner of things.

Alexandra is supposed to be at a great advantage against the empty-handed Penang Hill...
but she isn't.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Then let the games begin! Cry out in fear and beg for your life, Pe! My Juice Server is invincible. No matter how hard you train, it will penetrate your muscles...

A moment later, Penang Hill runs across the floor like a lightning bolt, fleshing out Alexandra. Alexandra hurriedly readies her weapon,
but Penang Hill is no longer in her weapon's range.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Penang Hill
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Dummy~
In such a narrow train, a long-handled weapon is at a disadvantage.

Speaking lazily, Penang Hill delivers a short uppercut on the right. It may have been tame in its own way― but it hits Alexandra in the jaw and shakes her brain, causing Alexandra to pull back and faint on the spot.
...That's what has happened with the two games so far. I wonder how Alexandra, who has been in a coma for a while, can be so adamant that she can win the last round.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ahh~! Come on, I'm confident! As a behind the scenes worker, I can see the whole picture... I've been following Pe's every move at the Night Butterfly, so I know all about how to serve the customers!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That means you can't beat me! Haha~♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Penang Hill
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: No, I don't know what you mean. You should think a little more before you speak, A. Ah~ this is seriously a waste of time.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: D-don't say that! Let the final game begin, Pe!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Penang Hill
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Hmm~
It's a three-part competition, and I'm two ahead, so it's already settled.
After scratching her head, Penang Hill picks up Alexandra with both hands. It's like a baby being lifted up. She then carries Alexandra to one of the seats and sits her down softly and gently.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Penang Hill
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I mean, you've been working behind the scenes, so you don't really know how to serve customers, do you? I'll show you an example, and you can watch from the side. Conductor, it may be annoying, but you have to play the role of the customer.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Penang Hill
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
It's faster to follow Conductor's example than to play useless games with you.
I'm sleepy. I want to finish this nonsense quickly.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Penang Hill
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Everyone at the Night Butterfly said it was too early for you. If we would have left you alone, you'd go out of control, play shopkeeper on your own, have an accident, and ruin the Night Butterfly sign.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Penang Hill
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It would be better to give up and teach you everything from scratch. You're not going to get any taller, and you look immature, but it seems like you can track my fists with your eyes.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Penang Hill
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
You're growing up a little bit, aren't you? I don't know.
I didn't want to be treated like a kid forever either...so I know how you feel.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: But Pe...Is that okay?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Penang Hill
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It's fine. If you do things your own way, you'll get into weird habits and you won't grow, so just watch from the side. That's what I did, and most of the newcomers to the Night Butterfly do the same. They learn by watching how their seniors behave.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Penang Hill
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
You're a little chrysalis, Alexandra.
I hope one day you'll hatch like a butterfly.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Penang Hill
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
You're still young and you're free,
so you don't have to go out of your way to aim for nightlife, but...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Penang Hill
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Well, it can't be helped. Making someone else's wishes come true is the raison d'etre of the Night Butterfly. Until you can live on your own, I'll bring you nectar. It's a pain in the ass, though.

Penang Hill turns away, and Alexandra hugs her in a very emotional way.
The two of them tangle together and roll off the seat.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Pe, Pe! I'm so happy.
I wanted to be recognized by you.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Penang Hill
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'm not recognizing you! I was only forced to do it because the conductor ordered me to! You need to stop being so touchy!

I look at the girls as they roll around on the floor,
rubbing each other close, smiling.
The two of them are rolling on the ground right now, but one day they will be able to dance through the night like butterflies― beautifully.
